page.title: 01 Farming in Tamworth (One).
page.content: A farmer's job is to grow food for his animals and food for people. Around Tamworth some farmers grow oats, oil seed rape, wheat and barley. The animals he keeps may be cows and sheep. {Oil seed rape} in the field looks yellow all over because of the yellow flowers. As a seed it looks like little balls. These are crushed to make oil. You can make breakfast cereal such as Oat Crunchies and porridge from the {oat} seed the farmer plants in his field. Most of the {barley} the farmer grows is taken to market to be sold to food manufacturers. The farmer keeps some of the barley behind and feeds it to his animals.
